steps.instruction:
Buy Angler Armor
Buy Angler Equipment
Buy Fishing Rod &b%9%&r

Buy Oak Logs &b%1%&r
Buy Sticks &b%2%&r
Buy Wooden Swords &b%3%&r
Buy Wooden Shovel &b%4%&r

steps.criteria: [NPC] Librarian: Greetings! Welcome to the Library!
[NPC] Blacksmith: I'm the town Blacksmith! I can reforge items for you, for a price.

steps.instruction:
Enchant items
&eGet splashed with grands
&eOR
&e1. Swap to main profile
&e2. Join a hub-selector hub
&e3. Throw a titanic in a corner
&e4. Collect xp on bingo profile

steps.criteria: [NPC] Bramass Beastslayer: Hello, adventurer! I am Bramass Beastslayer! I've slain beasts of all sorts across SkyBlock!
[NPC] Grandma Wolf: I've added the Grandma Wolf Pet to your Pets Menu.
[NPC] Michael: Go talk to him if you want to learn more!
[NPC] Ike: Talk to me again if you want to check your progress!

steps.instruction:
Unlock Mushroom Collection 2
&7(Use Silk-Touch Axe on big Mushrooms)

Place Sheep Minion
&cDon't forget a storage!
Apply Black Diamond to Zombie Pickaxe
steps.doesntHave: Click the ANVIL BELOW to combine.

steps.instruction:
Give Rhys Enchanted Items
&c/warp mines if stuck

steps.criteria: [NPC] Fetchur: thanks thats probably what i needed

steps.instruction: Apply Black Diamond to Fractured Mithril Pickaxe
steps.doesntHave: Click the ANVIL BELOW to combine.

steps.instruction:
Find and kill a Star Sentry
&eAsk in chat and lobby-hop if necessary.

steps.criteria: [NPC] Lone Adventurer: Try killing 5 of them!

steps.instruction:
Get Ender Helmet &b%1%&r
Get Ender Chestplate &b%2%&r
Get Ender Leggings &b%3%&r
Get Ender Boots &b%4%&r
Start a Tier 1 Zombie Slayer Quest
Start a Tier 2 Zombie Slayer Quest

Buy Wooden Swords &b%1%&r
Buy Wooden Pickaxes &b%2%&r
Buy Wooden Hoes &b%3%&r

Store Chainmail Armor
Store Gold Armor
Give Oak Logs to Lumber Jack

steps.criteria: [NPC] Charlie: Howdy! Yer a friend of Lumber Jack, are ya?
[NPC] Charlie: The Park is home to many different kinds of wood. Each kind has its own collection.
[NPC] Kelly: But then I broke my axe!
TRIAL OF FIRE! Completed Trial of Fire I!
[NPC] Melody : Yes, I'm fine, though my beloved Harp was broken to pieces by the storm.
[NPC] Molbert: Great. First thing we need is to build some traps.
[NPC] Molbert: Fantastic, that's all I needed to build the traps.
[NPC] Romero: I'm.. trying to find gold...
